data.author: Tamsin Egerton

data.quote: Oh, yeah, I did the online dating thing. I did Nerve, I did Match. On Nerve there was this one guy who, when I asked him what he did for a living, said he 'used to be in a band.' I was like, 'That is not an occupation.'
data.author: Julie Klausner

data.quote: I didn't write my book, 'I Don't Care About Your Band,' in order to give women a brand-new set of dating rules they need to feel terrible about not abiding. data.author: Julie Klausner

data.quote: I'm not traditional at all. It's not that I'm against marriage; it just never mattered that much to me. I love the idea of finding someone to be a great father figure to Jasper and to share my life with.

data.quote: People could rationally decide that prolonged relationships take up too much time and effort and that they'd much rather do other kinds of things. But most people are afraid of rejection.

data.quote: I also like men who like dogs. I couldn't date a man who doesn't like my dog.

data.quote: Like many of you, I've always been slightly obsessed with vampires, dating back to the prime-time series 'Dark Shadows,' which I followed avidly as a kid.
data.author: Bill Condon

data.quote: I don't want to be the person who has the gigantic headlines: 'Look Who So-and-So Is Dating Now.' That, to me, isn't really who I am.

data.quote: I've got mates who have got married through meeting on Internet dating sites, so it really can work out - even if sometimes it does go disastrously wrong.

data.quote: I've dated men my age, younger than me and older. The only difference is the young ones are quicker at taking out the garbage.

data.quote: I have experienced bad dating and ineptitude with women all across the globe, from Vietnam to Paris. When I was 21, women were an enigma; they were this code that had to be cracked. data.quote: Honestly, I think dating is hard. Period.
data.author: Sevyn Streeter

data.quote: It's the fashion, I tell you: big, tall women going out with tiny, tiny men.

data.quote: My girlfriend bought me a down jacket, she said it fit my personality.
data.author: Jay London

data.quote: Dating is for tools.

data.quote: So I go to my first book signing, and these two girls came up and gave me a piece of paper: '10 reasons you should date our dad. He climbed Mount Kilimanjaro. He's a lawyer.' He didn't know what was going on. He didn't even know me. They called him, and he came down and asked me out that day. Now I'm dating their dad!
data.author: Hoda Kotb

data.quote: My grandmother always used to wear this English perfume called Tuberose and then she died and then I dated this girl who wore the same thing. data.quote: So if I was dating somebody now and the relationship didn't work out, I'd take that as failing.
data.author: Gavin DeGraw

data.quote: When I don't have a girlfriend, who I am answerable to, I can go out and hang with people. But whether you go for a movie with someone or a meal or a drive, it is assumed that you are dating that person.

data.quote: Someone who'll bring some normalcy into my life and help me stay in touch with reality. That is something I'm curious about. There are so many actors who are married to people from non-film backgrounds, and their marriages are successful. I'm tired of dating actresses.
data.author: Shahid Kapoor

data.quote: I have no wisdom to share on dating.
data.author: Rachel Dratch

data.quote: Are you kidding? I'm a terrible cook, but John is a really great one. Literally, I never cook. The whole time we were dating, I prepared two officially romantic meals. Both of them were such disasters that he begs me never to go into the kitchen again.

data.quote: Here's the funny thing about the response I've been aware of to my dating famous people: It's been very negative. I'm either not good-looking enough, not a good enough actor or not successful enough for these people.

data.quote: I always wanted so much glamour in my life, so I have always been obsessed with class, and from dating a few people who were from old money and a few from new money in my 20s, I just sort of became obsessed with this idea of clueless rich people.

data.quote: I was dating this guy and we would spend all day text messaging each other. And he thought that he could tell that he liked me more because he actually spelt the word 'YOU' and I just put the letter 'U'.

data.quote: I have a lot of boyfriends, I want you to write that. Every country I visit, I have a different boyfriend. And I kiss them all.

data.quote: I'm single, and I hate dating.

data.quote: After a number of years dating, we decided we were good partners.

data.quote: I'm finally dating. It's fun.

data.quote: I was bullied. I was a bit of a geek. Good-looking guys were off-limits. I didn't start dating until I was 18.

data.quote: I feel like there is always a rumor that I'm dating someone that I never met before. People have their judgments and ideas of who I am, and they know nothing.

data.quote: Mum left school at 15, and after a few years of modelling and dating jazz musicians, was married by 21 to my father, Mike Taylor, a journalist on the 'Daily Mirror.' data.quote: Dating is just awkward moments and one person wants more than the other. It's just that constant strangeness. I think it's a very real thing.
data.author: Jason Schwartzman

data.quote: It's difficult dating as an actor because your free time is precious. The guy I end up with someday is going to have to love traveling.

data.quote: I'm Canadian. The only difference between dating American and Canadian guys is whether you'll be watching football or hockey. I have no preference.

data.quote: If you're dating the quarterback and then you go out with the hockey player, you just go to the hockey games. I don't think I'll still go to the football games.

data.quote: I've given up looking for a boyfriend. That's not to say I won't be interested if the right guy comes along. But I'm not in a hurry.

data.quote: It's always been my personal feeling that unless you are married, there is something that is not very dignified about talking about who you are dating.

data.quote: If I talk to a woman for more than five minutes I can tell you exactly whether she's an Aidan girl or a Mr. Big girl. Aidan girls are more interested in nurturing relationships and building a nest while Mr. Big girls are more about show and having fun.

data.quote: If you look at Gothic detailing right down to the bottom of a column or the capital of a column, it's a small version of the whole building; that's why, like dating the backbones of a dinosaur, a good historian can look at a detail of a Gothic building and tell you exactly what the rest of the building was, and infer the whole from the parts.

data.quote: Everything I buy is vintage and smells funny. Maybe that's why I don't have a boyfriend.

data.quote: I think feminism's a bit misinterpreted. It was about casting off all gender roles. There's nothing wrong with a man holding a door open for a girl. But we sort of threw away all the rules, so everybody's confused. And dating becomes a sloppy, uncomfortable, unpleasant thing.

data.quote: My husband's a little younger than me. When I first started dating him, I just fell mad for him. I made a deal with myself: I was like, 'I'm not gonna get weird about what the future might be. I'm just going to be in every moment I can and enjoy us to the fullest.' I told him that, too.

data.author: Afrika Bambaataa

data.quote: I spend my money on holidays and eating out, and it allows me to be generous.
data.author: James Nesbitt

data.quote: I believe God wants you to have money to pay your bills, send your kids to college and do charity work and build orphanages. There's the teaching that we're supposed to be poor to show that we're humble. I don't buy that. I think we're supposed to be leaders. We're supposed to excel.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: My parents survived the Great Depression and brought me up to live within my means, save some for tomorrow, share and don't be greedy, work hard for the necessities in life knowing that money does not make you better or more important than anyone else. So, extravagance has been bred out of my DNA.
data.author: David Suzuki

data.quote: Many novice real estate investors soon quit the profession and invest in a well-diversified portfolio of bonds. That's because, when you invest in real estate, you often see a side of humanity that stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and saving money shelter you from.
data.author: Robert Kiyosaki

data.quote: Back in the 1970s, Kodak tried to give $25m to a black civil rights organisation in Rochester, New York. The company's shareholders rose up in arms: making this politically charged offering wasn't the reason they had entrusted Kodak with their money. The donation was withdrawn.
data.author: Noreena Hertz

data.quote: I know you don't always need to spend a ton of money to be stylish.
data.author: Mark Indelicato

data.quote: When men do not have healthy notions of the Divinity, false ideas supplant them, just as in bad times one uses counterfeit money when there is no good money.
data.author: Voltaire

data.quote: I grew up in an era of pretty severe poverty. My parents weathered the Great Depression, and money was always a very big concern. I was weaned on a shortage mentality and placed in foster homes largely because there simply wasn't enough money to take care of the most basic of needs.
data.author: Wayne Dyer

data.quote: We live in a digital world where all is available at the touch of a screen. Money has been simplified, changed subtly over time from tangible bills to numbers in cyberspace. Cash is no longer in a cloth bag; it's numbers on a screen. Numbers that can be manipulated and modified. If you run out of numbers, you can just buy some more, right?
data.author: Rhys Darby

data.quote: There's a time in everyone's career where you go, 'Ah, this is hard - how long am I going to have to do this?' But the rewards are so great. Who gets to go on the podium and hear the national anthem? The whole nation singing! Money can't buy you that.
data.author: Mo Farah

data.quote: One of the big myths about philanthropy is that it's all about donating funds for a cause. I like to look at it quite differently. Philanthropy is about 'giving' - not just in monetary terms but also in non-monetary aspects, like time, ideas, or being a volunteer. Donating money is just a small part of philanthropy.
data.author: Pankaj Patel

data.quote: Money doesn't talk, it swears.
data.author: Bob Dylan

data.quote: What does it mean when people applaud? Should I give 'em money? Say thank you? Lift my dress? The lack of applause - that I can respond to.
data.author: Barbra Streisand

data.quote: Money, it turned out, was exactly like sex, you thought of nothing else if you didn't have it and thought of other things if you did.
data.author: James A. Baldwin

data.quote: If all the rich and all of the church people should send their children to the public schools they would feel bound to concentrate their money on improving these schools until they met the highest ideals.
data.author: Susan B. Anthony

data.quote: I know of nothing more despicable and pathetic than a man who devotes all the hours of the waking day to the making of money for money's sake.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller

data.quote: To have done anything just for money is to have been truly idle.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: Successful people make money. It's not that people who make money become successful, but that successful people attract money. They bring success to what they do.
data.author: Wayne Dyer

data.quote: Speculation is only a word covering the making of money out of the manipulation of prices, instead of supplying goods and services.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: I could have closed down bits of British Home Stores to make more money but it's not my style. I want to make my money as a retailer, not by putting people out of work.
data.author: Philip Green

data.quote: Ridiculous yachts and private planes and big limousines won't make people enjoy life more, and it sends out terrible messages to the people who work for them. It would be so much better if that money was spent in Africa - and it's about getting a balance.
data.author: Richard Branson

data.quote: I never lost money by turning a profit.
data.author: Bernard Baruch

data.quote: I try to do the right thing with money. Save a dollar here and there, clip some coupons. Buy ten gold chains instead of 20. Four summer homes instead of eight.
data.author: LL Cool J

data.quote: I actually thought that it would be a little confusing during the same period of your life to be in one meeting when you're trying to make money, and then go to another meeting where you're giving it away. I mean is it gonna erode your ability, you know, to make money? Are you gonna somehow get confused about what you're trying to do?
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: Money coming in says I've made the right marketing decisions.
data.author: Adam Osborne

data.quote: The press don't like to say nice things because nice is boring. It's much better to label me the devil. What we do is not brain surgery. We are entertainers, plain and simple, and we're responsible to bring that money back, to make a profit.
data.author: Michael Bay

data.quote: You get quick money, it's beautiful, there's sunshine, but at the end of the day, you find out it's all a masquerade, baby. It's not what it seems.
data.author: Wyclef Jean

data.quote: If it wasn't for the fun and money, I really don't know why I'd bother.
data.author: Terry Pratchett

data.quote: A lot of poets too live on the margins of social acceptance, they certainly aren't in it for the money. William Blake - only his first book was legitimately published.
data.author: Jim Jarmusch

data.quote: What white man can say I never stole his land or a penny of his money? Yet they say that I am a thief.
data.author: Sitting Bull

data.quote: I don't want to be married to someone who feels inferior to my success or because I make more money than he does.
data.author: Grace Kelly

data.quote: I made enough money to buy a house. That's crazy, but fame proved ephemeral.
data.author: Moon Unit Zappa

data.quote: Our idea is to serve everybody, including people with little money.
data.author: Ingvar Kamprad

data.quote: I'm a businesswoman who's serious about her money. I want an empire.
data.author: Toni Braxton
